attributes.action: Create a Unitary Authority between Central and West Lancashire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently the West Lancs District Council decided against Unitary Authority status between Central lancashire and West Lancashire. This was done without any consulation, that I'm aware of,and I believe we should have had  afull public debate and referendum on this issue for the people of Central and West Lancashire
